entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 70
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING
SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
